Divine Communication.quote: And when My servants ask you concerning Me, indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me. (Quran 2:186)

Divine Answers.quote: Before they call I will answer; while they are still speaking I will hear. (Isaiah 65:24)

Divine Guidance.quote: Your ears shall hear a word behind you, saying, 'This is the way, walk in it.' (Isaiah 30:21)

Divine Messages.quote: In the past God spoke to our ancestors through the prophets at many times and in various ways. (Hebrews 1:1)

Divine Signs.quote: We will show them Our signs in the horizons and within themselves until it becomes clear to them that it is the truth. (Quran 41:53)

Divine Revelations.quote: All scripture is given by inspiration of God. (2 Timothy 3:16)

Divine Whispers.quote: Be still, and know that I am God. (Psalm 46:10)

Divine Voice.quote: The voice of the Lord is powerful; the voice of the Lord is majestic. (Psalm 29:4)

Divine Dreams.quote: For God speaks in one way, and in two, though man does not perceive it. In a dream, in a vision of the night... (Job 33:14-15)

Divine Silence.quote: After the earthquake came a fire, but the Lord was not in the fire. And after the fire came a gentle whisper. (1 Kings 19:12)

Divine Oracle.quote: Consult the Book of the Lord and read. (Isaiah 34:16)

Divine Insight.quote: Call to me and I will answer you and tell you great and unsearchable things you do not know. (Jeremiah 33:3)

Divine Teaching.quote: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go; I will counsel you with my loving eye on you. (Psalm 32:8)

Divine Words.quote: The words that I speak to you are spirit, and they are life. (John 6:63)

Divine Language.quote: Day after day they pour forth speech; night after night they reveal knowledge. (Psalm 19:2)

Divine Confirmation.quote: You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart. (Jeremiah 29:13)

Divine Dialogue.quote: Come now, let us reason together, says the Lord. (Isaiah 1:18)

Divine Prompting.quote: Whether you turn to the right or to the left, your ears will hear a voice behind you. (Isaiah 30:21)

Divine Expression.quote: The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands. (Psalm 19:1)

Divine Echo.quote: Deep calls to deep in the roar of your waterfalls. (Psalm 42:7)

Divine Counsel.quote: For to us God revealed them through the Spirit. (1 Corinthians 2:10)

Divine Direction.quote: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight. (Proverbs 3:5-6)

Divine Interpretation.quote: Do not interpretations belong to God? (Genesis 40:8)

Divine Understanding.quote: The Lord gives wisdom; from his mouth come knowledge and understanding. (Proverbs 2:6)

Divine Truth.quote: When the Spirit of truth comes, he will guide you into all the truth. (John 16:13)

Divine Wisdom.quote: If any of you lacks wisdom, you should ask God, who gives generously to all. (James 1:5)

Divine Instructions.quote: All your children will be taught by the Lord, and great will be their peace. (Isaiah 54:13)

Divine Presence.quote: The Lord is near to all who call on him, to all who call on him in truth. (Psalm 145:18)

Divine Connection.quote: Abide in me, and I in you. (John 15:4)

Divine Communion.quote: Our fellowship is with the Father and with his Son, Jesus Christ. (1 John 1:3)
